thread.section_title: Hotel Lumen - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Delightful spot at perfect location
thread.title_full: Delightful spot at perfect location - Review of Hotel Lumen, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rachel C
title: Delightful spot at perfect location
text: This location is perfect and the service was amazing. After a long and stressful day of travel, the staff here was so helpful and pleasant when I finally arrived. Don't miss the breakfast-- it was absolutely delicious and a perfect way to start the day. I would recommend this place to friends. A great experience for my first trip to Paris.
